guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body: Actually most of the top posters and contributors are women, and ALL of the successful guild creators are. Even though the site is probably 90% male the female brain is simply superior at creativity and social influencing, the most critical skills for online success.
body_html: Actually most of the top posters and contributors are women, and ALL of the successful guild creators are. Even though the site is probably 90% male the female brain is simply superior at creativity and social influencing, the most critical skills for online success.

body: You'd be surprised at just how many of them are women. I'm actually starting to think *most* of the top users are based on my interactions, and I think this is because women are more creative and better at communicating and influencing, to the point where they almost naturally rise to the very top without even thinking about it. Most of the active male users (like me) are just wannabes whose content is lame and infrequent.
body_html: You'd be surprised at just how many of them are women. I'm actually starting to think most of the top users are based on my interactions, and I think this is because women are more creative and better at communicating and influencing, to the point where they almost naturally rise to the very top without even thinking about it. Most of the active male users (like me) are just wannabes whose content is lame and infrequent.

body: Hey I’m a woman. I came here because I heard about it and just wanted to check it out. I stick around to try to balance out the site’s “provocative” to “non-provocative” content ratio I guess.

post.title: Women of Ruqqus, do you exist? If yes, why did you come here?

body: Because I find politeness and political correctness to be two alternate terms for lying and I'd much rather people be direct even if rude. Because I feel that #nolivesmatter, that it is not a given that others are required to care about you for any reason whatsoever. Because I find most people insecure, uneducated, self-deluding, and over-reactionary in every aspect of their lives and it's nice to vent. Because I'm not remotely sexually repressed, I find extremely little offensive, and its fun to watch people flip their shit.

Because I feel that #nolivesmatter, that it is not a given that others are required to care about you for any reason whatsoever. Because I find most people insecure, uneducated, self-deluding, and over-reactionary in every aspect of their lives and it's nice to vent. Because I'm not remotely sexually repressed, I find extremely little offensive, and its fun to watch people flip their shit.
